name: BORDERS (Sleeprunner Studios)
description:
G A M E

BORDERS is a stealth game in second order. While your family tries to cross the border of the German Democratic Republic, it's up to you to distract the guards from your car. 

  • Protect your family from the searchlights while they are trying to cross the border
  • Make use of the possibilities your car offers you
  • Don't fall asleep

BORDERS is a contribution for the Franken Game Jam 2020 and was made within 48 hours. 

Right now we're working on a post Jam Update. The update will deal with several minor bugs (Quit Button, AI Pathfinding) and it will provide some improvements regarding the controls (Gamepad & Keyboard) and other mechanics.
